title: Edwardian newsreel
creator_credit: B F I National Film Library
brief_description: Records events and personalities during the reign of Edward VII, compiled from contemporary newsreels. The film covers a wide field of events including the funeral of Queen Victoria, and suffragette disturbances, the Delhi Durbar and finally the funeral of Edward V11.
